head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MORTENSEN, MARTIN R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MORTENSEN, MARTIN R.

block.p: MORTENSEN-Martin R. On October 25, 2000. Formerly of Garden City, NY. Beloved husband of Anne and the late June. Loving father of Bradley, Scott, John, Tracy Murray and Kate. Cherished grandfather of 13. Dear brother of George, Joyce Clements, Laura Bry, Nicholas and Carol Kane. Proud member of Steamfitters Union Local 638. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Ave at 12th St. Garden City Sat. 7-9PM and Sun 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial, Monday 10AM St. Josephs R.C. Church, Garden City. Interment Locust Valley Cemetery, Locust Valley, New York.
